TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InstanceData extends System.Object

summary.span: 保存与性能计数器样本关联的实例数据。

span.span: Holds instance data associated with a performance counter sample.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的内容存在于特定的对象本地计算机上。The following code example displays the contents of the objects that exist in a particular on the local computer. 它首先显示的编号的列表类别。It first displays a numbered list of categories. 用户输入的一个类别数后，此示例显示了针对每个中，与每个实例关联的实例数据。After the user enters the number of one of the categories, the sample displays, for each in the , the instance data associated with each instance of the .
